Title: Part 8: The River Escape
Text:
- Escape from the Elven Kingdom!
Thranduil has only his jewels inmind and has locked us up! We must escape from his prison!
Maybe there's a path to the river somewhere around here?

When I find it, I should swim east, Lake-town is the next destination,
I hope on the way someone can help us to get into town.
CompleteText:
We have left the elven pursuers behind!

But how do we get to the lake town??
